Belgian Chocolate Fridge Cake

  • 6 ozs unsalted butter
  • 12 ozs crushed digestives
  • 3 ozs chopped nuts
  • 3 ozs raisins
  • 3 ozs sultanas
  • grated rind of 1 orange - OPTIONAL
  • 3 tablespoons golden syrup
  • 5 tablespoons drinking chocolate powder.

Crush biscuits, throughly mix in the nuts, fruit (and rind, if used). Melt the butter with the syrup, then stir in the chocolate powder and beat to blend well. Pour into the biscuit mixture and stir until the crumbs are well coated & sticky.

Chill for at least an hour.

Cover with melted chocolate ... cut into tray-bake sized pieces

Published: January 18 2012
